import { useState } from "react"; import Close from "../../Images/times-solid.svg" import socket from "../../socket"; import "./modal.scss"; const Modal = ({ show, close }) => { const [ data, setData ] = useState({ title: '', heading: '', context: '', url: '', avatar: '', }) const handle = (e) => { const newData = {...data} newData[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newData) } console.log(data) return(
{ show ?
close()}>
